data.name: BypassPaymentProcessing
data.comment: phrase: Bypass real-time payment processing

data.name: EcommerceNodeTitle
data.comment: Title of the ecommerce node.

data.comment: Name of the ecommerce node for site sync.

data.comment: Url name of the ecommerce node.

data.comment: Title of the order management node.

data.name: OrderManagementNodeUrlName
data.comment: Url name of the order management node.

data.name: EcommerceToolboxSectionTitle
data.comment: Title of the toolbox section which holds the widgets of ecommerce modules.

data.name: EcommerceToolboxSectionDescription
data.comment: Description of the toolbox section which holds the widgets of ecommerce modules.

data.name: DefaultCurrencyConfig
data.value: The name of the default currency (ISO-4217)
data.comment: Description of the default currency configuration property.

data.name: CurrencyNameConfig
data.value: Name of the currency as per ISO-4217 standard.
data.comment: Describes the currency name configuration property.

data.name: CurrencyTitleConfig
data.value: Title of the currency in English.
data.comment: Describes the currency title configuration property.

data.name: CountryNameTitleConfig
data.value: Title of the country name in English.
data.comment: Describes the country name configuration property.

data.name: CountryIsoCodeTitleConfig
data.value: Title of the country iso code.
data.comment: Describes the country iso code configuration property.

data.name: SupportedCurrenciesConfig
data.value: Supported currencies by the ecommerce module. Please be sure to not delete your default store currency.
data.comment: Describes the supported currencies configuration property.

data.name: CurrenciesAllowed
data.value: Allowed currencies by the ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the allowed currencies configuration property.

data.name: CurrencyExchangeRateConfig
data.value: The exchange rate of the currency relative to the default currency.
data.comment: Describes the exchange rate of the currency relative to the default currency.

data.name: CurrencyIsDefaultConfig
data.comment: Is Default.

data.name: CurrencyIsActiveConfig
data.value: Gets or sets whether a currency is active. When in multicurrency mode, only active currencies get used. Please be sure not to deactivate the default currency of your store.
data.comment: Is Active.

data.name: SupportedCountriesConfig
data.value: Supported countries by the ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the supported countries configuration property.

data.name: SupportedStatesConfig
data.value: Supported states and provinces by the ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the supported states and provinces configuration property.

data.name: SupportedMassUnitsConfig
data.value: Supported mass measurement units by the ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the supported mass units configuration property.

data.name: UnitAbbreviationConfig
data.value: International abbreviation for the measurement unit.
data.comment: Describes the unit abbreviation configuration property.

data.name: MeasurementUnitTitleConfig
data.value: Title of the measurement unit in English.
data.comment: Describes the unit title configuration property.

data.name: SupportedLengthUnitsConfig
data.value: Supported length measurement units by the ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the supported length units configuration property.

data.name: MassUnit
data.comment: Describes the name of the mass unit property

data.name: LengthUnit
data.comment: Describes the name of the length unit property

data.name: DefaultMassUnitConfig
data.value: The default unit of mass to be used by ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the default mass unit configuration property.

data.name: DefaultLengthUnitConfig
data.value: The default unit of length to be used by ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the default length unit configuration property.

data.name: ShippingFromCountryConfig
data.value: The ISO code (e.g. US, DE) for the country from which the products will be shipped.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from country configuration property.

data.name: ShippingFromCityConfig
data.value: City as string from which the products will be shipped.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from city configuration property.

data.name: ShippingFromAddressConfig
data.value: Address as string from which the products will be shipped.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from address configuration property.

data.name: MerchantNameConfig
data.value: Merchant name as string from which the products will be shipped.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from merchant name configuration property.

data.name: ShippingFromStateProvinceConfig
data.value: The state / province from which the products will be shipped. This should be blank when the merchant country is not “US” or “CA”.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from state / province configuration property.

data.name: CountryIsoCodeConfig
data.value: Gets or sets the ISO code (e.g. US, DE) for the country from which the products will be shipped.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from country configuration property.

data.name: ShippingFromZipConfig
data.value: The zip code from which the products will be shipped.
data.comment: Describes the shipping from zip configuration property.

data.name: StoreNameConfig
data.comment: Describes the store name configuration property.

data.name: MerchantEmail
data.value: The merchant email which is used when sending emails from the merchant.
data.comment: Describes the merchant email configuration property.

data.name: SendOrderPlacedEmailToShippingAddress
data.value: Check this box if you want order placed email sent to the shipping address in addition to the billing address.
data.comment: Describes the merchant email configuration property.

data.name: MerchantName
data.value: The merchant name which is used when sending order confirmation emails from the merchant.
data.comment: Describes the merchant name configuration property.

data.name: PriceDisplayComment
data.value: How to display prices on the site?
data.comment: phrase: How to display prices on the site?

data.name: WhichTaxToInclude
data.value: Which tax is included in prices?
data.comment: phrase: Which tax is included in prices?

data.name: ExcludingTax
data.value: Excluding tax. Tax will be included on checkout
data.comment: phrase: Excluding tax

data.name: ExcludingTaxExample
data.value:
Example:
Price entered in the CMS: $100
Price displayed in the product list: $100
Checkout: $120 ($100 + $20 tax)
data.comment: Excluding tax example

data.name: IncludingTaxAutomatically
data.comment: phrase: Including tax automatically

data.name: IncludingTaxAutomaticallyExample
data.value:
Example:
Price entered in the CMS: $100
Price displayed in the product list: $120 ($100 + $20 tax)
Checkout: $120 ($100 + $20 tax)
data.comment: Including tax automatically example

data.name: IncludingTaxManually
data.value: Including tax manually (prices will be entered including this tax)
data.comment: phrase: Including tax manually (prices will be entered including this tax)

data.name: IncludingTaxManuallyExample
data.value:
Example:
Price entered in the CMS: $120
Price displayed in the product list: $120
Checkout: $120 ($100 + $20 tax)
data.comment: Including tax automatically example

data.value: The tax display mode to be used by ecommerce module.
data.comment: Describes the tax display mode configuration property.

data.name: TaxToDisplayInPriceConfig
data.value: The id of the tax to be used when displaying tax in price.
data.comment: Describes the tax to display in price configuration property.

data.value: The display tax in price settings have changed.
data.comment: phrase: The display tax in price settings have changed.

data.value: The display tax in price settings changes have not been saved.
data.comment: phrase: The display tax in price settings changes have not been saved.

data.name: SkuDelimiterConfig
data.value: The delimiter (separator) of the SKUs of the product options. It is used to separate the SKUs stored in the shopping cart details.
data.comment: Describes the SKU delimiter in the ecommerce configuration property.

data.name: DefaultBoxLengthConfig
data.value: Default shipping box length (numeric value only. units defined in DefaultLengthUnitConfig setting)
data.comment: Description Default box length (numeric value only. units defined in DefaultLengthUnitConfig setting)

data.comment: Description Default box width (numeric value only. units defined in DefaultLengthUnitConfig setting)

data.name: DefaultBoxHeightConfig

data.comment: Description Default box height (numeric value only. units defined in DefaultLengthUnitConfig setting)

data.comment: The value cannot be null or empty or zero

data.value: There was an error while processing the request.
data.comment: There was an error while processing the request.

data.name: PriceInOtherCurrencies
data.comment: phrase: Price in other currencies

data.name: SystemNotReady_MissingShippingFromZip
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please set the 'ShippingFromZip' property in the Ecommerce configurations. This can be set by navigating to Ecommerce -> Store Settings -> Shipping Configurations; and select Ecommerce from the menu on the left.
data.comment: The message shown to user when ecommerce system is missing 'ShippingFromZip' information.

data.name: SystemNotReady_MissingShippingFromCountry
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please set the 'ShippingFromCountry' property in the Ecommerce configurations. This can be set by navigating to Ecommerce -> Store Settings -> Shipping Configurations; and select Ecommerce from the menu on the left.
data.comment: The message shown to user when ecommerce system is missing 'ShippingFromCountry' information.

data.name: SystemNotReady_NoPaymentMethodsDefined
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please define at least one payment method for the ecommerce.
data.comment: The message shown to user when ecommerce system has no payment methods defined.

data.name: SystemNotReady_MissingSMTPHost
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please set the 'Host' property in the SMTP (Email Settings) configurations. This can be set by navigating to Administration -> Settings -> Advanced -> System -> SMTP (Email Settings) and filling in the value for Host.
data.comment: The message shown to user when ecommerce system is missing 'SMTP Host' information.

data.name: SystemNotReady_MissingSMTPUserName
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please set the 'UserName' property in the SMTP (Email Settings) configurations. This can be set by navigating to Administration -> Settings -> Advanced -> System -> SMTP (Email Settings) and filling in the value for UserName.
data.comment: The message shown to user when the ecommerce system is missing 'SMTP UserName' information.

data.name: SystemNotReady_MissingSMTPPassword
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please set the 'Password' property in the SMTP (Email Settings) configurations. This can be set by navigating to Administration -> Settings -> Advanced -> System -> SMTP (Email Settings) and filling in the value for Password.
data.comment: The message shown to user when the ecommerce system is missing 'SMTP Password' information.

data.name: SystemNotReady_MissingMerchantEmail
data.value: The ecommerce is not completely configured. Please set the 'Email' field in the general store settings. This can be set by navigating to Ecommerce-> Store settings -> General
data.comment: The message shown to user when the ecommerce system is missing 'MerchantEmail' information.

data.name: SystemNotReady_InvalidFormatMerchantEmail
data.value: The 'MerchantEmail' is an invalid email format. Please check the 'MerchantEmail' property in the Ecommerce configurations. This can be seen by navigating to Ecommerce -> Store Settings -> Shipping Configurations; and select Ecommerce from the menu on the left.
data.comment: The message shown to user when the ecommerce system property 'MerchantEmail' has an invalid email format.

data.name: ModuleNotLicensed
data.value: E-commerce functionality is disabled since the E-commerce module is not licensed.
data.comment: Module Not Licensed message

data.name: EmailNotificationPending
data.value: Send email notification for pending orders
data.comment: Send email notification for pending orders

data.name: EmailNotificationPendingNote
data.value:
In case there is no confirmation from the payment provider, the status of the order will remain pending.
You should manually check what is the status for these orders with the respective provider
data.comment: In case there is no confirmation from the payment provider, the status of the order will remain pending. You should manually check what is the status for these orders with the respective provider

data.comment: How frequently receive notification

data.comment: Weekly value in the frequency notifications combo box
